Title: Relates to authorizing the imposition of service charges upon certain real property
Summary: Authorizes the imposition of service charges upon certain real property.
LawCode: Amd §§102 & 490, add §§403 & 497, Art 4 Title 2 §420, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to authorizing the imposition of service charges upon certain real property
